description: Try our easy to follow Minted Rack Of Lamb recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lamb dishes,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Minted Rack Of Lamb Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 Frenchtrimmed racks of lamb, each with 4-5 ribs
2 tsp fresh ginger root, finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Prick the flesh of the racks of lamb all over with a sharp knife. Place them in a shallow, nonmetallic dish and set aside.

Place all the remaining ingredients in a food processor and process until you have a fairly smooth paste. Rub this paste all over the racks of lamb, cover, and marinate in the refrigerator for 24 hours.

When ready to cook, allow the lamb to come to room temperature. Place the racks on a baking sheet lined with nonstick parchment paper, flesh side up, and cook in a preheated oven at 176°C for 2025 minutes or until cooked to your liking.
Remove from the oven and cover with foil. Allow to rest for 56 minutes before serving.
